name: Pocket Kingdoms QP
description:
Explore, expand, and build your own kingdom in this exciting,new strategy game. Designed exclusively for the iphone and ipod touch, Pocket Kingdoms is a unique and complex strategy game with easy to grasp rules and simple controls. Manage your resources and land tiles as you compete to become the greatest kingdom in the land.  

Compete to create the greatest kingdom as you race to settle the richest lands and cultivate them before your opponents do. Build farms, lumber mills, mines, and more as you expand your kingdom and grow your treasury. Face off against the other lords of the land as you raid and garrison land tiles or build and upgrade your own lands to become an economic powerhouse.

This free version offers a tutorial mode along with solitaire and versus play.
